articles.title: Boy, 14, shot in Brockton
articles.description:
The teenage boy was transported to a local hospital with nonlife-threatening injuries.

The post Boy, 14, shot in Brockton appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A 14-year-old boy was shot in Brockton on September 8.
He was taken to a local hospital with nonlife-threatening injuries.
This incident raises concerns about youth safety in the Brockton area.

articles.title: Feds arrest 171 suspected members of drug cartel in New England, including 49 in Mass.
articles.description:
The DEA arrested 617 suspected members of the Sinaloa Cartel across the country in August.

The post Feds arrest 171 suspected members of drug cartel in New England, including 49 in Mass. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Feds arrested 171 suspected Sinaloa Cartel members in New England in August.
Massachusetts saw 49 arrests, impacting local drug trafficking operations.
Increased law enforcement presence aims to enhance community safety in Boston.

articles.title: Holidays not on the “calendar”
articles.description:
Pattie Hunt Sinacole shares information on floating holidays

The post Holidays not on the “calendar” appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pattie Hunt Sinacole discusses the significance of floating holidays for Boston workers.
Floating holidays allow flexibility, impacting employee satisfaction and work-life balance in Boston.
Employers in Boston may need to adapt policies to accommodate these non-traditional holidays.

articles.title: Stefon Diggs talked about his Patriots debut, and the respect he has for Mike Vrabel
articles.description:
"That is a guy you want to run through a wall for," Diggs said of Vrabel.

The post Stefon Diggs talked about his Patriots debut, and the respect he has for Mike Vrabel appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Stefon Diggs praised Mike Vrabel ahead of his Patriots debut on September 8, 2025.
Diggs expressed strong respect for Vrabel, stating, 'That is a guy you want to run through a wall for.'
Diggs' enthusiasm may boost team morale for Boston fans this season.
